string-array.name: tips
string-array.item:
Android for Iranians\n
Welcome! The device you have in your hand is powered by an Android specially customized for Iranians.

Tap on this white box for more information. @drawable/android_logo

FarsiTel for You\n
FarsiTel adds to Android what an Iranian wants in Android. Explore your phone to find out and enjoy.

Visit us in http://farsitel.com. @drawable/farsitel_logo

Know the buttons.\n
Press Home whenever you want to get back to here. Back brings you to your previous screen. Use Menu to access Menu in each screen. Search is a shortcut for performing a quick search. @drawable/buttons

Access your apps.\n
Touch the Launcher icon to see all of your applications.

If you want quick access to an app, touch and hold it until it vibrates, then drag to your Home screen. @drawable/all_apps

Rearrange Home screen.\n
Touch and hold an item and when it vibrates, drag it where you want, or to the Trash icon to remove it.

Swipe left or right to switch between Home screens. You can also drag items to other screens. @drawable/trash

Contact Us\n
Help us in achieving a mobile operating system for Iranians by telling us what you need, and reporting bugs.

We're waiting for you: support@farsitel.com.

Done with this widget?\n
Touch and hold it and when it vibrates, drag it to the Trash icon.

Now you can fill your Home screens with what you actually need and use. Enjoy what FarsiTel has prepared for you.
